tutorial1: The red pots are very volatile and, if not handled with care, can cause explosions.
tutorial2: The yellow pots contain medicine that can heal any injury.
tutorial3: When you are done playing around with your powers, approach the gate to start.
tutorial4: You can shoot with the [Left Mouse Button] or [Right Mouse Button] to mark a object,
To exchange places with the object, you need to press [Shift],
If two objects are marked, then both will exchange places,
If only one object is marked, then only you will switch places.
